name: The LGBT Asylum Project
description: Free legal representation for LGBTQ+ asylum seekers
fullDescription: The LGBT Asylum Project provides free legal representation and support to LGBTQ+ asylum seekers fleeing persecution based on their sexual orientation or gender identity.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free legal representation for asylum cases
- Help preparing asylum applications
- Court representation
- Case management support
- Connection to community resources
- Pro bono attorney referrals
howToGetIt:
1. Contact The LGBT Asylum Project
2. Complete intake process
3. Must be LGBTQ+ asylum seeker
4. Cases handled by volunteer attorneys
5. All services are free
